title: Competency Development Program for Adult Learning Context-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Construction of reality-based scenario-driven learning environments reflecting diverse sociocultural contexts

learning_goals: Learners can apply a framework to analyze various adult learning contexts (simple, complex, chaotic).
Learners can design instruction tailored to learner needs in a context-based simulation environment with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can verify the completeness and depth of learning design against a detailed rubric with at least three levels of specificity through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
